page.title: 11Birdham Nurseries
page.content: Along the two roads leading to East and West Wittering there are a variety of nursries with retail outlets. Rusels Garden Centre serves not just the village but a wide area around Chichester. It sells grden tools, buildings, chemicals and a wide variety of plants, seeds and bulbs. Bramber Nursery sells mainly roses, shrubs and herbaceous plants. Bellfield Nursery ha a shop selling vegetables and fruit and also sells its own bedding plants and vegetable plants. Other smaller nurseries and farms sell salad vegetables, eggs, and dairy (including goats') produce. Several large nurseries produce salad vegetables or shrubs for wholesale only.
